title: fanoutqa: Where are the birthplaces of the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China? (3c06e4cb010ad679)

chat_history.content: Where are the birthplaces of the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China?

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "Name the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China."}

function.name: delegate
function.arguments: {"instructions": "For each of the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China, what is their birthplace?"}

chat_history.content: You shouldn't delegate the entire task to a helper. Handle it yourself, or if it's still too complex, try breaking it up into smaller steps and call this again.
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Here is the birthplace of each of the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China:

1. Xi Jinping: Xi Jinping was born in Fuping County, Shaanxi province, China.

2. Hu Jintao: Unfortunately, I was unable to find specific information on Hu Jintao's birthplace.

3. Jiang Zemin: Jiang Zemin was born in the city of Yangzhou, Jiangsu province, China.

4. Yang Shangkun: Yang Shangkun was born in Yi County, Sichuan province, China.

5. Li Xiannian: Li Xiannian's birthplace was in Xianning, Hubei province, China.
chat_history.name: delegate

chat_history.content:
Based on my information, here is the birthplace of each of the last five presidents of the People's Republic of China:

1. Xi Jinping - Fuping County, Shaanxi province, China
2. Hu Jintao - Unknown
3. Jiang Zemin - Yangzhou, Jiangsu province, China
4. Yang Shangkun - Yi County, Sichuan province, China
5. Li Xiannian - Xianning, Hubei province, China
